Title: Cold Snap
Plot: HRG convinces Emile Danko, a.k.a. "The Hunter", to release Tracy from Building 26, in hopes that she will lead them to "Rebel". As Angela evades capture, she turns to an old friend for help. In Los Angeles, Hiro and Ando continue on their latest mission from "Rebel" to protect the newest hero.
GuestStars: David H. Lawrence XVII, Lisa Lackey, Brea Grant, Zeljko Ivanek, Swoosie Kurtz
